keywords.value: White Helmets (Syrian Civil Defense Volunteer Group)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Khaled Khatib, who helped film a nominated short about his group, was denied a passport waiver. Homeland Security cited “derogatory information.”

headline.main: U.S. Blocks Syrian Rescue Worker From Attending the Oscars
